attributes.action: change the logo for the 2012 Olympics from the horrible angular mess that it currently is.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The issue has been widely publicised that the new logo for the London 2012 Olympics is extremely unpopular.

If you think that these Olympics deserve something which we will be able to look back on in the future and be proud of, please sign this petition.

We also deserve an explanation why they felt the need to change the logo in the first place, and why it cost so much?
Why not let the public choose from a shortlist?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
